Html: How do I change the text-alignment of a header in the DataGrid? Is there any way besides creating a whole new ControlTemplate? I do not wish to lose any existing functionality, such as automatic columnwidth.

Hi xyph,

Try the following:

<Style x:Key="HeaderStyle" TargetType="{x:Type dg:DataGridColumnHeader}">
    <Setter Property="HorizontalContentAlignment" Value="Right"/>
</Style>

Setting your DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle to this style will right align the header text.
